title: Keoma – Ein Mann wie ein Tornado (IT ´1976)
notes: 1976 Enzo G. Castellari spaghetti western twilight with Franco Nero - considered one of last great westerns of the genre

title: Kids – In den Straßen N.Y.'s
notes: 1995 Larry Clark controversial debut about NYC street teens, Harmony Korine script - distinctive raw documentary style

title: Klasse (Die)
notes: 2008 Laurent Cantet Palme d'Or winner about Parisian classroom, English: The Class - French title more distinctive

title: König von Bastoy (Der)
notes: 2010 Marius Holst Norwegian film about 1915 boys' reform school uprising, English: King of Devil's Island

title: Krupp – Eine deutsche Familie (1-3_D ´2009_/TR)
notes: 2009 German TV miniseries about industrial dynasty Krupp family across generations - distinctive historical scope

title: Ku'damm ´56 (D ´2020_1-3)
notes: 2016 German TV miniseries (not 2020) about 1950s Berlin dance school, highly popular - spawned sequels Ku'damm 59 and 63

title: Ku'damm ´59
notes: 2018 sequel to Ku'damm 56 miniseries continuing Berlin dance school saga

title: Ku'damm ´63 (D ´2021_ 1-3)
notes: 2021 third installment of Ku'damm saga concluding the trilogy
